abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Mucous Cloud.
abilities.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

abilities.name: Probing Telepathy.
abilities.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.
